column2: String
str
忠义量谱

开启<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>钢铁信念<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现显示该技能使用状态的量谱。
想要集中仇恨时，建议使用钢铁信念。
职业量谱的说明可以随时在技能菜单中进行查看。
忠义量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>忠义精通<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>忠义量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
该量谱不仅会显示钢铁信念的状态，还会显示骑士的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>忠义<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>效果的具体量值。
自动攻击命中时会积累忠义量值，消耗忠义量值可以发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>盾阵<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、45级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>保护<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和62级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>干预<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
兽魂量谱

开启<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>守护<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现显示该技能使用状态的量谱。
想要集中仇恨时，建议使用守护。
兽魂量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>兽魂<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>兽魂量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
该量谱不仅会显示守护的状态，还会显示代表战士心中野性的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>兽魂<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的具体量值。
<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>原初之魂<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和45级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>钢铁旋风<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等技能都需要通过消耗积累的兽魂量值才能发动。
兽魂量值可以通过发动特定的技能进行积累。
暗血量谱

开启<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>深恶痛绝<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现显示该技能使用状态的量谱。
想要集中仇恨时，建议使用深恶痛绝。
暗黑量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑波动<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
暗黑量谱会显示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的持续时间。使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑波动<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和40级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑锋<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>可以附加暗黑状态。
暗黑状态中自身攻击所造成的伤害提高。
暗血量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗血<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗血量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
该量谱会显示暗血的具体量值。<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>血溅<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和64级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>寂灭<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等技能都需要通过消耗积累的暗血量值才能发动。
暗血量值可以通过发动特定的技能进行积累。
暗黑量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>至黑之夜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，暗黑量谱会显示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗技<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>状态。
消耗<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>至黑之夜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的防护罩效果可以附加暗技状态。
附加暗技状态后，可以通过只消耗暗技不消耗魔力的方式来发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑波动<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑锋<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
暗黑量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>掠影示现<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，一同战斗的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>英雄的掠影<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>会变成实体。暗黑量谱可以显示英雄的掠影实体存在的剩余时间。
百合花茎量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>神秘百合<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>百合花茎量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，
以显示当前<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>治疗百合<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>开花的数量。
当自身处于战斗状态时，每过一定时间就会开放一朵治疗百合，
消耗百合可以发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>安慰之心<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和76级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>狂喜之心<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
百合花茎量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>安慰之心效果提高<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，百合花茎量谱会显示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>血百合<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的状态。使用需要消耗治疗百合的技能，可以使血百合逐渐开放。
当血百合完全开放时，即可发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>苦难之心<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
以太超流量谱

使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>以太超流<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>以太超流量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前附加的以太超流量值。
异想量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>以太契约<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>异想量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前小仙女的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>异想以太<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>量值。在自身处于战斗状态且小仙女处于同行状态时，使用消耗以太超流的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>生命活性法<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>深谋远虑之策<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等技能可以增加异想以太量值，积累的异想以太量值可以用来发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>以太契约<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和76级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>异想的祥光<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
异想量谱

学会并使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>炽天召唤<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，可以暂时召唤出<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>炽天使<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>替代朝日小仙女和夕月小仙女。
异想量谱会显示炽天使的剩余存在时间。
奥秘量谱

发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>抽卡<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>奥秘量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前抽出的卡片。使用抽出的卡片可以获得各种各样的效果，同时卡片效果会临时取代<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>出卡<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
奥秘量谱/占卜量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>占卜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>占卜量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
在战斗状态下使用卡片技能，可以附加<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>日<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>月<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>星<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>三种标识的其中一种。当标识附加到三个时，即可消耗标识发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>占卜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
疾风迅雷量谱

发动特定的战技时可以触发<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>疾风迅雷<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>状态。
学会能够触发该状态的技能后，画面上会出现<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>疾风迅雷量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前疾风迅雷状态的剩余持续时间和量值。随着等级提升，量值在<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>红莲体势<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>金刚体势<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>下最多可以积累到三档，在<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>疾风体势<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>下最多可以积累到四档，疾风迅雷状态能够提升攻击速度与攻击所造成的伤害，积累的量值越多，提升的幅度越大。
斗气量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>斗气<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>斗气量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>斗气<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>量值。
斗气量值累计到最大后，可以发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>阴阳斗气斩<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和74级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>万象斗气圈<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
疾风迅雷量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>无我<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，可以将<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>疾风迅雷<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的持续时间暂时停止。
疾风迅雷持续时间停止时，表示时间的数值会不断闪烁。战斗状态下使用无我，会在无我持续生效的期间，一档一档连续附加疾风迅雷状态，直至最大档数。
龙血量谱

开启<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>苍天龙血<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>龙血量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前龙血状态的剩余持续时间。
在苍天龙血状态中，<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>跳跃<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>破碎冲<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的威力会得到提升。
龙血量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>红莲龙血<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，在龙血状态中每次使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>幻象冲<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>都可使<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>龙眼<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>睁开一档。
当龙眼睁开到最大的二档时，使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>武神枪<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>即可触发<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>红莲龙血<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性。
红莲龙血状态下可以发动强力的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>死者之岸<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和80级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>坠星冲<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
龙眼的睁开程度可以通过量谱上方的图像确认。另外，红莲龙血状态下龙血量谱会变为红色。
风遁量谱

学会三种结印手势后即可发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>风遁之术<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
发动之后画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>风遁量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示风遁之术的剩余持续时间。
忍气量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>集气法<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>忍气量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>忍气<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>量值的积累状况。忍气可以通过使用战技来进行积累，积累的忍气可以用来发动62级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>通灵之术·大虾蟆<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和68级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>六道轮回<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
雪月花量谱

武士的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>雪月花量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>可以显示当前<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>雪之闪<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>月之闪<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>花之闪<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的触发状况。
这三种<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>闪<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>可以通过发动特定的连击来触发，根据闪的触发状况不同，<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>居合术<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>将变为<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>彼岸花<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>天下五剑<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>纷乱雪月花<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>这三个不同的技能。
剑气量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>剑气专精<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>剑气量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>剑气<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>量值的积累状况。剑气量值可以通过发动战技来进行积累。积累的剑气量值可用来发动52级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>必杀剑·回天<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、54级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>必杀剑·晓天<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、70级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>必杀剑·红莲<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等与必杀剑相关的技能。
战歌量谱

发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>贤者的叙事谣<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>战歌量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前战歌的剩余持续时间。若<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>毒咬箭（烈毒咬箭）<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>风蚀箭（狂风蚀箭）<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的持续伤害在战歌效果中命中，则有一定概率触发<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>诗心<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，使<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>失血箭<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>与45级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>死亡箭雨<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的复唱时间重置。

当<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>毒咬箭（烈毒咬箭）<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>风蚀箭（狂风蚀箭）<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的持续伤害命中时，诗心效果有一定概率会被触发。在战歌中触发诗心可以大幅提高诗人的攻击力。

发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>军神的赞美歌<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>战歌量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前战歌的剩余持续时间。若<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>毒咬箭（烈毒咬箭）<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>风蚀箭（狂风蚀箭）<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的持续伤害在战歌效果中命中，则有一定概率触发<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>诗心<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，诗心量值由战歌量谱下方的音符标识表示，最多可以积累到四档。诗心能够提升攻击速度，积累的量值越多，提升的幅度越大。

发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>放浪神的小步舞曲<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>战歌量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前战歌的剩余持续时间。若<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>毒咬箭（烈毒咬箭）<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>风蚀箭（狂风蚀箭）<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的持续伤害在战歌效果中命中，则有一定概率触发<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>诗心<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，诗心量值由战歌量谱下方的箭头标识表示，最多可以积累到三档。消耗诗心可以发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>完美音调<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
灵魂之声量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>灵魂之声<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>灵魂之声量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>灵魂之声<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的具体量值。
触发诗心可以增加灵魂之声量值，消耗积累的灵魂之声量值可以发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>绝峰箭<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
机工量谱

画面上出现的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>枪管热度量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>可以显示枪管的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>热度<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>量值积累状况，使用特定的战技会导致枪管的热度上升。
热度量值积累到一定程度之后使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>超荷<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能，会进入过热状态。
35级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>热冲击<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和52级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>自动弩<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>需要在过热状态下才可以发动。
机工量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>车式浮空炮塔<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>电能量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
使用特定技能可以积累<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>电能<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的量值。发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>车式浮空炮塔<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，可以设置<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>炮塔<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>配合自己攻击敌人。消耗电能发动80级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>后式自走人偶<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能，可以召唤出<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>后式自走人偶<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>与自己共同作战。
元素量谱

使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>火系<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>魔法后会进入<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>星极火<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>状态，
此时火系魔法威力会有所提升，不过消耗魔力也会增加。
使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>冰系<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>魔法后会进入<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>灵极冰<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>状态，
此时魔力的自然恢复速度会大幅提升。
当处于3档<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>星极火<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>或<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>灵极冰<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>状态时，咏唱相反属性魔法所需的咏唱时间缩短。

在星极火或灵极冰状态下可以发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>天语<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能，发动后在元素量谱的右下侧将显示天语的使用状况。
在天语效果中，攻击魔法造成的伤害会有所提升，并且可以使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>冰澈<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等特定的魔法。星极火或灵极冰的效果消失时，天语也会一同消失。

咏唱<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>冰澈<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>魔法后，元素量谱的左下侧会出现显示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>灵极心<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>量值的标识。消耗灵极心能够抵消星极火效果中<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>火系<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>魔法增加的魔力消耗。在星极火状态下，每发动一次火系魔法都会自动消耗一档灵极心。

使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>天语<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，每经过30秒可以附加一次<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>通晓<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>状态，随之点亮量谱下方的水晶。元素量谱右下侧的计时指针代表着发动天语后经过的时间，指针每次从头走到尾需要30秒。
发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>秽浊<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>或80级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>异言<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能会消耗一档通晓量值。

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>通晓效果提高<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，通晓状态的最大档数达到了二档。
使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>天语<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，每经过30秒可以附加一次<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>通晓<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>状态，随之点亮量谱下方的水晶。元素量谱右下侧的计时指针代表着发动天语后经过的时间，指针每次从头走到尾需要30秒。
发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>秽浊<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>或80级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>异言<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能会消耗一档通晓量值。
以太超流

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>能量吸收<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>以太超流量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前附加的以太超流量值。
同调量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>龙神附体<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>同调量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示龙神附体的剩余持续时间。

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>龙神附体效果提高<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，同调量谱除了显示龙神附体的剩余持续时间外，还可以显示龙神附体的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>附体深度<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。每次龙神附体效果结束时可叠加一档附体深度。

当附体深度叠加到二档后，可以使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>龙神召唤<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
在使用龙神召唤时，同调量谱上会显示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>亚灵神巴哈姆特<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的剩余显现时间。

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>不死鸟附体<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>同调量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>会显示不死鸟附体的剩余持续时间。
附体深度
舞步量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>标准舞步<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>舞步量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。使用标准舞步可以进入<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>跳舞模式<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
在跳舞模式中按照正确顺序使用舞步量谱显示的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>舞步技能<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，再使用临时取代标准舞步的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>标准舞步结束<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，可以提高自己用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>闭式舞姿<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>选择的小队队员以及自身所造成的伤害。
舞步量谱的下方将显示跳舞效果的剩余持续时间。
幻扇量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>幻扇<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>幻扇量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前附加的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>幻扇<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>量值。
使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>逆瀑泻<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>升风车<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等技能会附加幻扇状态，最多可以积累到四档。发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>扇舞·序<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>或50级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>扇舞·破<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>需要消耗一档幻扇量值。
舞步量谱

学会并使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>技巧舞步<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>舞步量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>上会显示四种舞步技能。
与标准舞步一样，按照正确顺序使用舞步技能，再使用临时取代技巧舞步的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>技巧舞步结束<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，可以提高周围的小队队员与自身所造成的伤害。
幻扇量谱/伶俐量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>伶俐<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>幻扇量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>上会出现<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>伶俐量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示伶俐量值的积累状况。
当自身与小队队员附加了<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>标准舞步结束<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>技巧舞步结束<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的追加状态<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>伶俐<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>之后，发动战技或魔法时，会积累伶俐量值。积累的伶俐量值可以用来发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>剑舞<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
平衡量谱

赤魔法师有着独特的魔法体系，<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>平衡量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>可以显示其魔力源泉的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>白魔元<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>与<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>黑魔元<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>各自的量值。使用特定魔法可以积累魔元量值，不同魔法对两种魔元的积累效果会有所不同。当积累到一定程度后，<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>回刺<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等特定技能将被替换为<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>魔回刺<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等威力更大的技能。

另外，当白魔元与黑魔元差距过大时，平衡量谱上方的水晶会改变颜色，较少一方的魔元积累效率会降低。
因此积累魔元时一定要注意黑与白的平衡，这样才能更有效地提高攻击力。
晶壤量谱

开启<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>王室亲卫<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现显示该技能使用状态的量谱。
想要集中仇恨时，建议使用王室亲卫。
晶壤量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>晶壤装填<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>晶壤量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>晶壤<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的具体量值。
当<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>迅连斩<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和40级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>恶魔杀<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>连击成功时可以获得一档晶壤，发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>爆发击<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>或60级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>烈牙<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能时需要消耗一档晶壤。

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>不死鸟附体效果提高<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>不死鸟附体<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能便会出现<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>亚灵神不死鸟<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
在使用不死鸟附体时，<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>同调量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>上会显示亚灵神不死鸟的剩余显现时间。

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>照破<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现显示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>剑压<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>积蓄状态的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>剑压量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>居合术、燕回返、默想<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>可以获得剑压，使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>照破<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>可以消耗剑压。
